title: Im done
body: I need help. I am considering trieing to hang myself for a third time. I need know suicidehelpline etc. but they dont help. They dont know my story. I trust GD league more than any of my "friends" who i really only hang around so that i dont look like a loner. I am posting this from this acc so i dont get any spam on my main. I have dreams of playing league professionaly but my parents dont trust it/me and think it is not going to happen. I have a account in Master but doubt i would get challenger with limitations and restrictions that i have because of parents view of this as a waste of time. I have numerous times been told that i should forget it or do something else but i dont have anything else. I suck at school obv have 0 social skills and am done with being alone in this world. sry about bothering GD but i promised my someone i would talk to someone and this is the best way that i feel i can talk.

replies.body: Hey OP, I've added your account in-game. Feel free to accept whenever if you want to chat or add me via your main any time.
Best riot member to talk to.

Hey Mate...

First of all I'd recommend taking these feelings to a trained professional who can work with you through the immediate problems. 

If you genuinely are feeling suicidal please reach out to a loved one or your school Councillor and visit 

https://www.lifeline.org.au/
13 11 14

The best part of what you've written is that it's obvious you have goals - a very important step in turning into an adult. Now the other great thing is guess what, League isn't going anywhere and the team based right here in Oz are constantly building and developing new & exciting opportunities for players to get involved in the game professionally which will be ongoing for many years to come. 

I know it's easier said then done, but mate, slow it all down and take a deep breath. Don't get hung up on social skills or academic success to the point where it affects your mental health, I can guarantee it all gets better & one day you will more then likely chuckle at how worried you were about all of these things. 

I hope this has been of some benefit and if you ever want to add me in game to chat and vent about some things - please do so.

So.. I've been around a lot of people who are in a similar situation to you. Lots, my partner included.

Everyone is going to tell you things will change, they don't really just change though. It takes effort, you will have to put in work. For some people happiness is just simple, they're the lucky ones I guess. Most of us however have to work at it, there most likely not be some life changing moment that changes everything no single clarifying moment. It will be a slow process of learning to accept that which you cannot change and working through the things you can.

Psychologist help, but they're not mechanics. They don't just lift up the hood and change a few things to get you working again, even with them a lot of it is on you to improve but they do help you to understand your emotions and often have good advice to help you see it while it's happening. 

Another note I'd like to add, I know you haven't mentioned a partner or gf or anything, but I want to stress how important it is that doesn't change anything. Getting in a relationship shouldn't bring you happiness, you should bring your happiness to the relationship. That level of dependence will smother a relationship.

Take it slow, nothing changes in a day. I'd accept that first

I'd like to give you some practical advice.

The single most important thing is to not give up on anything. That includes school and socialising. Don't feel as though you can't succeed in these areas because you can. Being in the Master division is achievement enough and clearly your especially talented, but don't set your hopes solely on league. Your friends might actually care for you more than you think, especially if they know you feel this way. My friends have always been there for me and I once felt the same way you did but they were there for me throughout the whole period. Its pretty cliche but suicide is a permanent solution to a temporary problem and your best option here would be to persevere, not just through life and league but also through your education and social interaction.

Please don't hurt yourself :(
